details.title: The Calculation of Frequency-Modulation Distortion in Linear Networks
details.abstract: A numerical method is developed for the calculation of steady-state FM distortion in a linear passive network from the character of the FM signal input and the steady-state transfer characteristics of the network. The method of calculating FM distortion requires the solution of a finite set of linear equations which is accomplished readily by a digital computer. To illustrate the use of the method, the FM distortion introduced by a Chebyshev-response bandpass filter is calculated for a range of network and input signal parameters.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
